name: Urban Wave Fighter
description:
Fight against your opponent and try to push him out of the stage by smashing the ground and creating waves! Join this big deathly battle between city gangs and become the leader of the city!

This game was originally developed on Global Game Jam 2017 and received minor improvements in the following months. This is the demo version - the plan is to make a final one with lots of characters, stages and new mechanics!

ENJOY!
